topic.title: prefix()
topic.para: Description: Insert a prefix before the name part of the parsed name-value pairs to help further processing. For example:

listitem.para: To insert the my-parsed-data. prefix, use the prefix(.my-parsed-data.) option.
If you forward the parsed messages using the IETF-syslog protocol, you can insert all the parsed data into the SDATA part of the message using the prefix(.SDATA.my-parsed-data.) option.
To refer to a particular data that has a prefix, use the prefix in the name of the macro, for example, ${my-parsed-data.name} .
